TopicTitle: Ask a question; Get a clever answer back!

Articles.Content:
Buy all the snacks and feed them to Mr. Monopoly.

How do I get boxcars?

Head down to the train yard and buy one.

Why were steam trains retired?

Because they lost their loco-motivation!

*Knock Knock*

"Who's there?"

i m talking to a certain amount of being right now get it ?

Should i ?

Depends.

Why does the rain fall from above?

Because if it fell from below it would defy the laws of gravity.

Why aren't I eating my dinner yet?

You already ate your other one.

Why didn't you notice the the extra the in that sentence?

You already ate your other one.

Why didn't you notice the the extra the in that sentence?

Because there was no redundant "the" in any other sentence than the sentence the word "that" was used in.

What killed the dinosaurs?

Nothing, they're still alive. I HAVE EVIDENCE! OPEN YOUR EYES SHEEPLE!

- - - Updated - - -

Oh yeah: Why is the sky blue?

It's for a similar reason that we call yellow "yellow" and red "red". It's because of the evolution of language.

Can life exist without oxygen hydrogen and carbon?

No, they make Ox and Co2

Why don't we use trains for everything? Ã¢â‚¬â€¹(yes these will be about trains)

Because of the metro north derailments

- - - Updated - - -

Why am I not hungry, but want food?

Fast food companies with mind control... No idea.

Why yhw?

Becuase, you so happen to feel like it. Deal with it.

Why do I have a craving to kill more kerbals? With Kerbals?

Because that is 5% the point of KSP.

Why have we progressed SO SLOWLY IRL in spaceprograms?

'Cause Human Space Program is dumb.

Why did I call hoomans dum?

Because you're a human.

Why am I on here right now?

Because reasons.

Why Kerbal Space Program? Why not MakeFunOfHumans Space Program?

Because MFOH SP was not a good abbreviation.

Why is there air?

Reasons.

Why Reasons?

why not?

Why do I always answer a question with a question?

Because much to learn have you young padawan.

Why did I just speak in a Yoda voice?

Because you ate a bag of plums.

Where are the Star Destroyers?

In your dreams.

Why Jool?

Why not Jrool?

Because it could be mistyped as Drool.

Why does SpaceplaneAddict not use rockets?
